interactivity.requirements: This Event can only be triggered on a Monday evening.
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Talk to Yumi in the first floor dorm hallway for the first time.

progression.synopsis: Sensei visits the dorm hallway and finds Yumi standing in front of her door. He attempts to greet her, only to be venomously rebuffed. She makes multiple rude and disparaging comments regarding Sensei's presence and behavior, while also insulting some of the other classmates. Without much fanfare, Yumi angrily tells Sensei to leave before storming into her dorm room, shutting the door behind her. Sensei takes the encounter in stride and heads home to go to bed.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.24 (replaces You Shall Not Pass ).
